Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Plantaricin S (PlnS; chain a, natural AMPs; two-chain class 2b bacteriocins; Ala-rich; UCLL2a; Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes)

Literature Information.Literature: Initially reported in 1993 (Jiménez-Díaz R  et al., 1993). This is a two-chain bacteriocin. Both chains are required for optimal activity. The sequence of chain B is KKKKQSWYAAAGDAIVSFGEGFLNAW (Stephens SK et al., 1998). Updated 4/2017.
Literature Information.Author: Jiménez-Díaz R, Ruiz-Barba JL, Cathcart DP, Holo H, Nes IF, Sletten KH, Warner PJ.1995
Literature Information.Title: Purification and partial amino acid sequence of plantaricin S, a bacteriocin produced by Lactobacillus plantarum LPCO10, the activity of which depends on the complementary action of two peptides
